enumChoice.choice: 0 – Pushbutton (default state ON/ACTIVATED); Accessory Decoder Address Enabled
1 – Pushbutton (default state OFF/DEACTIVATED); Accessory Decoder Address Enabled
2 – Momentary Pushbutton (default state OFF/DEACTIVATED); Use with Auto-Off Timer; Accessory Decoder Address Disabled
3 – Toggle switch (ON/ACTIVATED when switch is closed); Accessory Decoder Address Disabled
4 – Toggle switch (OFF/DEACTIVATED when switch is closed); Accessory Decoder Address Disabled
5 – Follows Previous output control; Accessory Decoder Address Disabled
